FuncDef:
The namespace-id command configures the IOAM namespace ID for the device.
The undo namespace-id command restores the IOAM namespace ID to 0 (default value). The namespace-id command configures the IOAM namespace ID for the device. The undo namespace-id command restores the IOAM namespace ID to 0 (default value). By default, the IOAM namespace ID of a device is 0. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the IOAM namespace ID for the device.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 65535. The default value is 0.
